page.about.greeting: Hello! My name is Ivan, I'm a frontend developer from Moscow withover a year of experience working on personal projects.
page.about.technical: My technical skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux toolkit, NextJS, Fresh, Tailwind, Sanity. I am interested in developing in this area and am looking for opportunities to participate in real projects and learn new skills.
page.about.adaptable: I have a desire for learning and independence, which helps me to successfully solve complex problems. I enjoy teamwork and am always willing to work with other developers to achieve mutual success.
page.about.freetime: I like to keep abreast of the latest web development trends and technologies. In my free time, I like to be creative: composing music or creating videos.
page.about.goal: My goal is to continue to develop as a developer and work on important projects that change the world for the better. I am always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow and am excited to see where my career will take me next.
